```{r}
# ---- Step 1 ---------------------------------------------------------------
library(tidyverse)

url <- "https://www4.stat.ncsu.edu/~online/datasets/EDU01a.csv"

edu01a <- read_csv(url, show_col_types = FALSE) %>% 
  select(
    area_name = Area_name,   # rename
    STCOU,
    ends_with("D")           # keep every column ending in “D”
  )

head(edu01a, 5)              # display first 5 rows
```
